rules.description: Detects nested loops that may indicate O(n²) or worse algorithmic complexity
rules.recommendation: Consider using hash maps, sets, or more efficient algorithms. For common patterns: use dictionary lookups instead of nested loops, or consider sorting + two-pointer approach.
rules.message: Nested loop detected. This may result in O(n²) or worse time complexity and performance issues with large datasets.

rules.description: Detects while(true) or similar patterns without clear exit conditions that may cause infinite loops
rules.recommendation: Add clear exit conditions using break statements or refactor to use a condition-based loop. Ensure that the loop can terminate under expected conditions.
rules.message: Infinite loop pattern detected without clear exit condition. This can cause application hangs if break/return conditions are missing.

rules.description: Detects functions with high cyclomatic complexity (10+ decision points)
rules.recommendation: Refactor the function into smaller, focused functions. Extract complex conditions into well-named helper functions. Consider using early returns to reduce nesting.
rules.message: Function has high cyclomatic complexity. Complex functions are hard to understand, test, and maintain.
